entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 1 May 2023
